channel.title: Sweets on Family Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in Sweets on Family Recipes

item.title: Bunnuelos
item.description: Ingredients Dough 3 cups of flour 1 tsp of salt Water Tomatillo leaves Syrup Piloncillo Cinnamon sticks Orange peels Recipe For dough, boil water with tomatillo husks. Strain the husks out. Add water slowly to flour as needed. Roll dough into approximately a dozen balls. Let rest for 30 minutes. In a castiron skillet add water, cinnamon sticks, orange peels, and piloncillo. Simmer until piloncillo disolves. In a seperate skillet heat oil for frying.
